Name: wmo_wis2_gc_gb_connected
Description: Connection status to the Global Broker

Name: wmo_wis2_gc_gb_lastmessage
Description: Timestamp of the last message from the Global Broker

Name: wmo_wis2_gc_downloaded
Description: Number of data items downloaded to Global Cache

Name: wmo_wis2_gc_downloaded_errors
Description: Number of download errors for Global Cache data

Name: wmo_wis2_gc_dataserver_status
Description: Status of WIS2 Node dataserver (1-up and 0-down)
